hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty') && case "$FILE_PATH" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.css) cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && pnpm exec biome check --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; exit 0;; *.py) cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/backend" && uv run ruff check --fix "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null && uv run ruff format "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; exit 0;; *) exit 0;; esac
